description: Luxurious shawl-collar robe in rich red satin

core:description.text: An elegant shawl-collar robe in a rich red hue. Crafted from luxurious satin, this beautiful robe features a wide shawl collar that drapes gracefully around the shoulders and a self-tie belt at the waist. The flowing silhouette with long sleeves provides both comfort and sophistication, perfect for lounging in style.
